title: Bug 13196[Browsing] Consequences of changes
OB: When performing manipulations with an open editor, the behavior is inconsistent. Some manipulations affect the working copy shown in the editor, while others do not.
EB: Both manipulations should behave consistently. If there is an open editor, all manipulations should work on the working copy shown in the editor.
SR: 1. Open an editor. 2. Perform various manipulations (provide specific manipulations if possible). 3. Observe the behavior and note any inconsistencies in how manipulations affect the working copy.
